text: Irna Phillips (July 1, 1901 â€“ December 23, 1973) was an American scriptwriter, screenwriter, casting agent and actress. She created, produced, and wrote several of the first American daytime radio and television soap operas, including Guiding Light, As the World Turns, and Another World.
